flex2.tools.oem.internal

Class LibraryCompilerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • flex2.compiler.common.Configuration
      • flex2.tools.ToolsConfiguration
        • flex2.tools.CompcConfiguration
          • flex2.tools.oem.internal.LibraryCompilerConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinkerConfiguration, Cloneable

    public class LibraryCompilerConfiguration
extends CompcConfiguration
    A configuration that extends CompcConfiguration by adding options for -loadConfig and -compute-digest.
    Version:
    2.0.1
    Author:
    Clement Wong
